RelatedSentence: It was the third time Arnold Pickering , 44 , had gone on the run .
He and armed robber Thomas Moffett , 51 , had left HMP Kennet in Liverpool at 9.30 am on Saturday morning and were due back at around 4.40 pm the same day .
Merseyside Police say Pickering was arrested at an address in Oldham at around 11.45 am on Monday .

A1: a life sentence for stabbing to death
RelatedSentence: Pickering is serving a life sentence for stabbing to death a 55 - year - old man , wrongly identified as a paedophile , in Oldham in 1990 .
He had absconded twice earlier during his sentence , but later handed himself in again on both occasions .
Michael Alcock was released from HMP Kennet after serving a two - a - half - year prison sentence .

Mr Alcock said Justice Minister Chris Grayling would be wrong to radically reform the current system because of some high - profile absconders .
Mr Grayling and the Prime Minister 's official spokesman both said changes to the temporary release regime would be made as soon as we can .

Open prisons house around 6,400 inmates , roughly 7.6 % of the UK 's total prison population .
Figures show that of the 204 prisoners who absconded last year , 194 were being held in open prisons .
